articles.description: Gas prices continue to climb as we edge closer to the summer months
articles.content:
Guess whos back, back again, Gas Prices back, tell a friend.
Thats right folks, Gas Price Watch is back and for a limited time only. Its for a couple of not-spectacular reasons. You see, for the fir… [+2952 chars]
